attributes.action: help Horsham FC locate and build a new ground in Horsham
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Horsham fc need a new ground after selling theirs and an original plan for it to be build at the Holbrook Club were turned down. So i propose that the government help the club to negotiate with the Holbrook club or to help the football club find a new site in Horsham where they can build the ground. Also Horsham FC may need financial support which the government could offer but i think it is vital that the club gets a new ground as they play a large part in life in this town

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
